channel.title: flexbox on Ryan's blog - A blog about front-end
channel.description: Recent content in flexbox on Ryan's blog - A blog about front-end

item.title: flexbox 深入理解
item.description: flexbox 巩固加深 配合flexbox工具食用更佳 flexbox 支持情况 整体印象 flex: 0 ( flex-grow ) 1 ( flex-shrink ) auto ( flex-basis ); 默认值-( 属性 ) flex-basis 控制着元素在沿着主轴上 grow 和 shrik 之前最终能
